document_data.name: Fenugreek
document_data.mainbody: '''Fenugreek''' was a type of plant found in the Realms that was commonly used in cooking.
document_data.Availability: * ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' sold fenugreek under its "Aurora's Larder" section for 3 [[silver piece]]s per {{SI|1|ounce}}.
document_data.Usages:
* These plants could be used medicinally as a stimulant.
* Certain [[spell]]s in the [[evocation]] and [[necromancy]] [[schools of magic]] could be aided by a tailored infusion of fenugreek.<ref group="note" name="level">More specifically, this effects 5{{th}} level evocation spells and 7{{th}} level necromancy spells.
